title: The Beginning
excerpt: Find out where Freeloader and Subaiku came from, and how they see the fun and challenging game that is Stormbound.

title: Midsummer Buffs
excerpt: Sheepyard has gifted us some free content to discus. We oblige as only Freeloaders can!

title: OK, Boomers
excerpt: Freeloader and Subaiku are discussing some of the strongest elder cards in Stormbound. Who dodged the nerf hammer? Should they be nerfed now? Tune in to find out!

title: A New Bloke
excerpt: Freeloader and Subaiku welcome a third host. Who will this mystery host be, and are they truly crazy enough to spend an hour each week talking with us?!

title: What’s a Burf?
excerpt: Our hosts are hot on the trail of Stormbound breadcrumbs: an AMA, leaks in the Discord server and an interview with Brzoza help drawing a map of where Sheepyard is taking the game.

title: The Hunt for the Bread in October
excerpt: The Brewed Sages are excited for all the balance changes and new cards being introduced to Stormbound… but where are they going to find the resources to play with them?

title: From Earyn with Love
excerpt: Our hosts are back to discuss Stormbound with a very special guest. Emkaem makes his Brewed Sages debut and we review the state of the meta.

title: Introducing the BS Meta Report
excerpt: Our hosts have brewed up another tool to help Stormbound players achieve loftier finishes each month: The BS Meta Report! How does it work? Does it work?

title: A Winning Position(ing)
excerpt: In this last episode of October, our hosts discuss the extremely critical topic of unit positioning in Stormbound.

title: Nerfed November Rain of Frogs
excerpt: Our hosts are back again (and we are just as surprised as you)!  This time, it’s a whole new season of Stormbound—with a new card and multiple balance changes!

title: Valuing your Tempo
excerpt: Here to analyze the current meta with the second Meta Report AND an in-depth discussion on the difference and importance of tempo vs value.

title: Tempoing out some Value
excerpt: After deciding to change their schedule to an ever-other-week podcast, the hosts have now decided to return to a weekly podcast by dropping some sweet, sweet, Stormbound content a week early!

title: Bot Friends 4 Ever
excerpt: Freeloader gets a new friend to play with, Arthis has a new way to spend money in game, and Subaiku is just thankful he won’t see Earyn + Gift anymore… truly, a season to be grateful!

title: Linked Golems are POG Champs
excerpt: The hosts are back to discuss the 3rd BS Meta Report, whether Linked Golems are too powerful and the Conquest Tournament organized by the community!

title: Ending the Year with Vitality
excerpt: An incredible interview with the one-and-only RecklessRush + the patch notes for the upcoming January update from Sheepyard as our little holiday gift to one and all.

title: The Donuts of (Joust) Champions
excerpt: How are the balance changes going? Will The Brewed Sages be doing anything new this year? These questions and more will be answered—and come check out our new section: Card of the Week!

title: The BS is Getting PhD
excerpt: The hosts discuss the January edition of the BS Meta Report, provide an important PSA about playing Stormbound on an iOS device, and discuss the ever… existing card Rapid Mousers!

title: Hocus Focus
excerpt: We have news, we have an interview, we have a NEW CARD, and we have all the fun and excitement you can expect from three guys chatting about Stormbound!

title: The Temple Guardians of Doom
excerpt: An episode chalk full of upcoming changes to Stormbound! New cards, upgrades, game mechanic changes, and even quality of life improvements are all detailed!

title: 19 More than Subaiku Planned For
excerpt: We have all the analysis you could hope for on the new Temple of Heart, the changes to Confusion and Temple Guardians, along with plenty of laughs and bad ideas!

title: Head Banging to HV
excerpt: What card do they think is keeping rush down in the meta? Also, Arthis drops a HOT new track for the BS Meta Report theme song. Finally Emkaem wants to know which Brewed Sages episode is each hosts’ favorite… listen to find out!
